channel.description: Recent content in TU on Inductive Bias

item.title: Working on Mahout as part of your studies at TU Berlin
item.description: Working on Mahout as part of your studies at TU Berlin # Did you ever wonder, who those weird people working on free software projects are? Did you ever ask yourself how these developers organise their work, how they collaborate, which values are important to them? Did you ever think about participating in a free software project yourself but never really had time to do so because your studies were just too time-consuming?
